item.title: 巴西交易员对他们认为即将到来的降息犹豫不决
item.description: 央行的一份声明凸显了董事会内部的摩擦，这也影响了巴西掉期曲线的定价，该曲线显示的降息幅度低于交易员和分析师的预期。【原文：A central bank statement that underscored friction within the board tainted the pricing of Brazil’s swap curve, which is showing fewer cuts than traders and analysts think it should.】

item.title: 美国银行称美国介入支撑日元需要全球风险
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）表示，美国可能会与日本协调努力，以支撑陷入困境的日元，这将给全球金融体系带来广泛风险。【原文：It would take broad risks to the global financial system for the US to potentially coordinate efforts with Japan to shore up the beleaguered yen, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 沙特大型项目寻求合作伙伴以实现经济目标
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯大型项目的高级官员齐聚利雅得，分享最新进展情况，并寻求合作伙伴，以帮助实现穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼王储经济转型计划的关键支柱。【原文：Top officials from Saudi Arabia’s mega projects gathered in Riyadh to share progress updates and seek partners to help deliver a key pillar of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s plan to transform the economy.】

item.title: 加拿大亿万富翁、石油商阿瑟-欧文（Arthur L. Irving）逝世，享年 93 岁
item.description: 加拿大亿万富翁亚瑟-欧文（Arthur L. Irving）去世，他将加拿大最大的炼油厂现代化，扩大了以其家族名字命名的加油站网络，并帮助赢得了对跨国石油管道的支持。享年 93 岁。【原文：Arthur L. Irving, the Canadian billionaire who modernized the nation’s largest refinery, expanded a network of service stations bearing his family’s name and helped win support for a cross-country oil pipeline, has died. He was 93.】

item.title: 由 Invesco 支持的 Mynd 正与竞争对手 Roofstock 商谈合并事宜
item.description: 2021 年，住房运营商 Mynd 赢得了 Invesco 房地产基金 50 亿美元的委托，该公司与 Roofstock 的合并谈判已进入后期阶段，房屋销售市场的冻结促进了单户租赁行业的整合。【原文：Mynd, a housing operator that won a $5 billion mandate from Invesco Real Estate funds in 2021, is in advanced talks to merge with Roofstock, as a frozen market for home sales fuels consolidation in the single-family rental industry.】

item.title: 页岩油 "积压 "扩大，显示美国产量增长放缓
item.description: 能源公司连续第二个月增加了所谓的fracklog，这是美国页岩油产量增长放缓的最新信号。【原文：Energy companies added to the so-called fracklog for a second straight month in the latest signal of slowing growth in US shale oil output.】

item.title: 加纳两年来首家锂矿公司上市
item.description: 总部位于澳大利亚的大西洋锂业有限公司（Atlantic Lithium Ltd.）正在开发加纳的第一个锂矿，该公司已向该国的股权投资者筹集资金迈出了一步。【原文：Australian-based Atlantic Lithium Ltd., which is developing Ghana’s first lithium mine, has taken a step toward raising capital from equity investors in the country.】

item.title: 美国银行莫伊尼汉称，即使利率高企，消费者依然强劲
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）表示，美国消费者在工资增长的帮助下，即使在利率高企的情况下也保持着良好的状态，企业也再次开始关注并购。【原文：Bank of America Corp. Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan said US consumers, helped by wage growth, remain in good shape even amid elevated interest rates, and that businesses are once again looking at mergers and acquisitions.】

item.title: 分析发现：创纪录的移民潮推动英国住房租金上涨
item.description: 新的分析显示，由于住房供给跟不上人口增长的速度，创纪录的净移民人数推动了英国的租房危机。【原文：Britain’s rental crisis is being driven by record net migration as housing supply fails to keep pace with a growing population, according to new analysis.】

item.title: 德雅丹称加拿大应增加期限更长的抵押贷款

item.title: 意大利称乌克兰财政部长将参加斯特雷萨七国集团会议

item.title: 据说大众汽车在股价大涨后有意出售特拉通股票

item.title: GameStop 短裤在备忘录复兴中蒙受 14 亿美元的纸张损失
